name: Valentine Plotting
description:
Valentine Plotting is online.
This is the most classic and amazing flower shooting game.Make combinations to make them burst. Clear all the flowers to level up.

The game requires you to “plot” your next move in order to advance to the 2nd stage and go on.
It is amazing puzzling game that check you intelligence to advance to the next level.

So, What are you waiting for?
-Great Quality
-Easy to learn
-Playfulness
-No bugs
#Download and Enjoy#
